title: House, shop sealed over law violation
content:
FAISALABAD, Oct 25 (APP):The Faisalabad Development Authority (FDA) has sealed a house and a shop on the violation of map and building laws.

An FDA spokesman said here on Saturday that FDA Enforcement Team checked status of various plots in residential colonies and found violation of map in Palm Villas situated at Narwala Road.

Therefore, the FDA team sealed premises of the house besides sealing a shop in Faizabad Flats over violation of laws for its commercial use.

House owner and shopkeepers were directed to abide by rules and regulations otherwise strict action would be taken including registration of criminal cases if they were found involved in violation of building laws again, he added.
